item.title: US Same-Sex Marriage Legal Nationwide
item.dc:creator: @EcoPS_GM EcoPS GM
item.description:
@EcoPS_GM wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:74, topic:552185”][quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488188#msg4488188 date=1435628205]

Ask anybody. The forum would get hardly any posts a month.

Even so, I disbelieve that MITB (I hope that’s a widely used acronym here) would just drop the site due to inactivity.
[/quote]
Most of the boards were merged into this side, but yes.[/quote]
It seems more likely that it was for coalition purposes rather than inactivity purposes.

Read full topic

item.title: US Same-Sex Marriage Legal Nationwide
item.dc:creator: @EcoPS_GM EcoPS GM
item.description:
@EcoPS_GM wrote:

my-swagger:

Mitb became a dead forum, that’s why.

I’d rather believe t4’s response over this any day of the week

[quote=“t4, post:70, topic:552185”][quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488173#msg4488173 date=1435623010]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=671102.msg4488172#msg4488172 date=1435622817]

[quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488171#msg4488171 date=1435622338]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=671102.msg4488170#msg4488170 date=1435622070]

[quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488169#msg4488169 date=1435622025]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=671102.msg4488168#msg4488168 date=1435621389]

[quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488167#msg4488167 date=1435621308]

Im moving…
[/quote]Your name is ‘Fury King’ - you have no room to speak.

How Can You Say That Mate There Is Clearly Only One True God Jesus Christ, It Says So Right Here In My Book
[/quote]Is this an acronym? HCYSTMTICOOTGJCISSRHIMB. I’m using it.

Clearly, I’m making fun of those people.
[/quote]T’was sarcasm, my good man.

Idk, some moparscapers don’t understand it. Got to be sure, y’know.
[/quote]Of course. I don’t view it as hostility, but reassuring yourself. I’m also not a ‘MoparScaper’, as you say. I was developing far before delving RS2 mimicry. I digress - I understand your reasoning behind commenting on me quoting you. One can never be too sure which is sarcasm and which is not in text.

Excuse my implication you were a moparscaper
[/quote]I’m sorry? Are you insinuating that it’s a bad thing to be one?

It usually has a negative connotation amongst the older crowd, so yes.
[/quote]If by ‘older crowd’ you mean long-term members, then wouldn’t that just make this older crowd… Well, older MoparScapers? If I may - why does the term MoparScaper tend to have negative connotations? If calling one a simple user of this site would have negative meaning, why does anyone stay here?

A while ago the site used to be split between moparisthebest (moparisthebest.com) members and moparscape members (moparisthebest.com). Since mitbers (moparisthebest users) transitioned to exclusively using the IRC network, the two forums were consolidated under moparisthebest.com. Moparisthebest (the site) used to house RS cheating/hacking crowd while moparscape was home to mostly prepubescents looking for poorly written game emulation code.
[/quote]Ah, I understand! Well, with the current state of elitism, not to sound rude, why would the owner (I believe his name is MoparIsTheBest? Would explain it lol) merge the two sites? If one site is ‘superior than the other’, according to the community, it normally would sound like a foul idea to merge these sites. You’re just asking for tension and envy amongst the users, causing internal affairs.

I’ve already alluded to it: consolidation. Things have also gotten a little better around here (in terms of skill).[/quote]
I can understand this, but at the same time - it still baffles me. MoparIsTheBest had nothing to due with the RuneScape emulation scene, correct? Well, I don’t see why it’s so bad to have separate sites. Especially when those sites have, too, separate purposes.

EDIT:
Pardon me, I re-read your reply. It makes sense now. Was a nice chat, t4!

Read full topic

item.title: US Same-Sex Marriage Legal Nationwide
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“EcoPS GM, post:68, topic:552185”][quote author=t4 link=topic=671102.msg4488172#msg4488172 date=1435622817]

[quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488171#msg4488171 date=1435622338]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=671102.msg4488170#msg4488170 date=1435622070]

[quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488169#msg4488169 date=1435622025]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=671102.msg4488168#msg4488168 date=1435621389]

[quote author=EcoPS GM link=topic=671102.msg4488167#msg4488167 date=1435621308]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=671102.msg4488165#msg4488165 date=1435619878]

Im moving…
[/quote]Your name is ‘Fury King’ - you have no room to speak.

How Can You Say That Mate There Is Clearly Only One True God Jesus Christ, It Says So Right Here In My Book
[/quote]Is this an acronym? HCYSTMTICOOTGJCISSRHIMB. I’m using it.

Clearly, I’m making fun of those people.
[/quote]T’was sarcasm, my good man.

Idk, some moparscapers don’t understand it. Got to be sure, y’know.
[/quote]Of course. I don’t view it as hostility, but reassuring yourself. I’m also not a ‘MoparScaper’, as you say. I was developing far before delving RS2 mimicry. I digress - I understand your reasoning behind commenting on me quoting you. One can never be too sure which is sarcasm and which is not in text.

Excuse my implication you were a moparscaper
[/quote]I’m sorry? Are you insinuating that it’s a bad thing to be one?

It usually has a negative connotation amongst the older crowd, so yes.
[/quote]If by ‘older crowd’ you mean long-term members, then wouldn’t that just make this older crowd… Well, older MoparScapers? If I may - why does the term MoparScaper tend to have negative connotations? If calling one a simple user of this site would have negative meaning, why does anyone stay here?

A while ago the site used to be split between moparisthebest (moparisthebest.com) members and moparscape members (moparisthebest.com). Since mitbers (moparisthebest users) transitioned to exclusively using the IRC network, the two forums were consolidated under moparisthebest.com. Moparisthebest (the site) used to house RS cheating/hacking crowd while moparscape was home to mostly prepubescents looking for poorly written game emulation code.
[/quote]Ah, I understand! Well, with the current state of elitism, not to sound rude, why would the owner (I believe his name is MoparIsTheBest? Would explain it lol) merge the two sites? If one site is ‘superior than the other’, according to the community, it normally would sound like a foul idea to merge these sites. You’re just asking for tension and envy amongst the users, causing internal affairs.[/quote]
I’ve already alluded to it: consolidation. Things have also gotten a little better around here (in terms of skill). Also to point it out, ‘moparscaper’ nowadays refers to an individual who wasn’t a part of mitb, but a part of the greater community. It’s not as much of a derogatory term as it once was.

Read full topic

If I may - why does the term MoparScaper tend to have negative connotations? If calling one a simple user of this site would have negative meaning, why does anyone stay here?

A while ago the site used to be split between moparisthebest (moparisthebest.com) members and moparscape members (moparisthebest.com). Since mitbers (moparisthebest users) transitioned to exclusively using the IRC network, the two forums were consolidated under moparisthebest.com. Moparisthebest (the site) used to house RS cheating/hacking crowd while moparscape was home to mostly prepubescents looking for poorly written game emulation code.[/quote]Ah, I understand! Well, with the current state of elitism, not to sound rude, why would the owner (I believe his name is MoparIsTheBest? Would explain it lol) merge the two sites? If one site is ‘superior than the other’, according to the community, it normally would sound like a foul idea to merge these sites. You’re just asking for tension and envy amongst the users, causing internal affairs.
